page.title: 02 SEXEYS SCHOOL BRUTON.
page.content: Sexeys School is quite large and some of its buildings are quite old. There are four boarding houses in all,they are Junior House,Lisbury,Cliff and Coombe House.Sexey's is a mixed school,with about 250 pupils in the first five year-groups and 160 students in the Sixth Form.Junior House is only for the First Years and after a year you go to one of the other houses. Sexey's School was founded in 1889, it was started by the money left from the old endowments of Sexey's Hospital. The money was given to Sexey's Hospital by a man called Hugh Sexey,who lived in the sixteenth century.When the school started in 1889 it was a boys' day grammar school.Now it is a mixed boarding,comprehensive school.
